name: ESL Teacher Feedback Tool
description: Automated tool for VIPKid teachers to manage and respond to student feedback
icp: Online ESL teachers on VIPKid and similar platforms
problem: Managing and responding to student feedback is time-consuming and repetitive
aspiration: Spend less time on admin work and more time teaching

name: ENM Calendar API
description: Shared calendar system for polyamorous relationships
problem: Coordinating schedules across multiple partners is complex and leads to conflicts
aspiration: Avoid scheduling conflicts and maintain healthy relationships
workaround: Google Calendar with complex color coding, constant texting

name: AI Song Generator
description: Generate custom songs from text prompts for content creators
icp: YouTube creators and social media influencers
problem: Creating original music for content is expensive and copyright-risky
aspiration: Have unique background music without copyright strikes or high costs
workaround: Royalty-free music libraries (sound generic), paying musicians (expensive)

name: Developer Portfolio Generator
description: AI-powered portfolio website builder for developers
problem: Building a portfolio that stands out is time-consuming and many lack design skills
aspiration: Land first dev job with an impressive portfolio

name: Solopreneur Tax Assistant
description: AI chatbot that helps solopreneurs with tax questions and deductions
problem: Don't know what they can deduct, scared of doing taxes wrong, CPAs are expensive
aspiration: Maximize deductions without fear of audit, save CPA costs
